name: My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into (itch)
name_original: My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into (itch)
description:
*This game contains content that some players may find disturbing, such as descriptions of gore and violence.

In addition, the opinions and behaviors expressed by the characters are not endorsed by the developer.  Player discretion is advised. *

    xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
"I've always been looking at you from afar.

I began to like you from the moment we first met,

and I can't keep my feelings hidden anymore.

Please come to the big cherry tree after class.

I want to tell you how I feel."

        xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

🤍My new girlfriend is so cute and sweet. I can't believe such a nice girl likes me so much. But... would she still want to be with me if she knew what I'm into? 🤍  

  • A heart-pounding visual novel telling the story of  you and your new girlfriend.
  • Pick the name of your friend and girlfriend, as well your own name.
  • Featuring six different endings. Aim to see them all...?

Disponível em Português Brasileiro!

🤍🤍🤍🤍🤍🤍

The game is free to play, but donations are very appreciated.
